abstract: pmc Nat Commun Nat Commun 2873 ncomms Nature Communications 2041-1723 Nature Publishing Group PMC12480895 PMC12480895.1 12480895 12480895 41022687 10.1038/s41467-025-63547-3 63547 1 Article GM-CSF-dependent CD301b + Wilkinson Christina L. 1 http://orcid.org/0000-0003-2735-4119 Nakano Keiko 1 http://orcid.org/0000-0003-3050-1909 Grimm Sara A. 2 Whitehead Gregory S. 1 Arao Yukitomo 3 http://orcid.org/0000-0002-9561-8529 Blackshear Perry J. 3 Karmaus Peer W. 1 http://orcid.org/0000-0002-8262-8613 Fessler Michael B. 1 http://orcid.org/0000-0002-0052-3755 Cook Donald N. cookd@niehs.nih.gov 1 http://orcid.org/0000-0002-6343-4709 Nakano Hideki nakanoh@niehs.nih.gov 1 1 https://ror.org/01cwqze88 grid.94365.3d 0000 0001 2297 5165 Immunity, Inflammation and Disease Laboratory, Division of Intramural Research, National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences, NIH, 2 https://ror.org/01cwqze88 grid.94365.3d 0000 0001 2297 5165 Integrative Bioinformatics Support Group, Division of Intramural Research, National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences, NIH, 3 https://ror.org/01cwqze88 grid.94365.3d 0000 0001 2297 5165 Signal Transduction Laboratory, Division of Intramural Research, National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences, NIH, 29 9 2025 2025 16 478256 8547 21 5 2024 22 8 2025 29 09 2025 01 10 2025 01 10 2025 © This is a U.S. Government work and not under copyright protection in the US; foreign copyright protection may apply 2025 2025 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Open Access http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ The severity of allergic asthma is driven by the balance between allergen-specific T regulatory (Treg) and T helper (Th)2 cells. However, it is unclear whether specific subsets of conventional dendritic cells (cDCs) promote the differentiation of Tregs. We have identified a subset of lung resident type 2 cDCs (cDC2s) that display high levels of CD301b and have potent Treg-inducing activity ex vivo. Single-cell RNA sequencing and adoptive transfer experiments show that during allergic sensitization, many CD301b + + + + + + Distinct subsets of conventional DCs (cDCs) promote the differentiation of distinct helper T cell lineages. Here, the authors identify a GM-CSF-dependent cDC2 population in the mouse lung that expresses CD301b at steady state and promotes the differentiation of Treg cells, whereas during the initiation of allergic responses, these cDC2s transition to CD200 + Subject terms Immune tolerance Mucosal immunology Asthma Asthma Conventional dendritic cells https://doi.org/10.13039/100000066 U.S. Department of Health & Human Services | NIH | National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS) ZIA ES102025-09 ZIA ES102025-09 Cook Donald N. Thus, inhaled corticosteroids remain the primary treatment for asthmatics. Although these powerful anti-inflammatory drugs are effective in the short term, they affect multiple immune cell types and are therefore not appropriate for long term use. Immunotherapies in the form of SCIT and SLIT are effective; scRNA-seq of peripheral blood mononuclear cells from patients before and after SLIT treatment leads to clonal expansion of allergen-specific Tregs as well as trans-type Th2 cells that express high musculin TGF-β IL-2 48 One approach to mitigate the symptoms of asthma is to improve the efficiency of immunotherapy so that shorter regimens can be used. It is well established that Tregs suppress allergic responses and their differentiation is promoted in vitro by the cytokines TGF-β and IL-2 12 + + 18 + 49 A role for the IL-10 receptor on cDCs for tolerance induction was previously reported 44 + + + 41 Mgl2 + + Tgfb1 Cd200 + Furin 50 + Nrros Nrros + 51 + Our scRNA-seq data and cDC migration assays revealed that tolerance-inducing CD301b + 52 Ccr7 –/– plt/plt 53 54 Ccr7 –/– Ccr7 –/– GM-CSF drives proliferation of multipotent myeloid progenitors, resulting in the expansion of myeloid cells, including granulocytes, macrophages and cDCs 55 56 57 58 Csf2r 32 + Csf2rb ∆DC + Csf2 ∆ARE + + + + + Csf2rb ∆DC Flt3 59 The reduction of CD301b + Csf2rb ∆DC 60 61 + The present study reveals that lung resident cDC2s displaying CD301b are the predominant cDC2 subset at steady state, and that these cDCs preferentially induce Treg differentiation from naïve CD4 + + Methods Mice All animal procedures complied with institutional guidelines and were approved by the NIEHS Animal Care and Use Committee (Animal Study Protocols 05-22 and 05-23). C57BL/6 J (stock 000664), Cd11c Cre (Itgax-cre)1-1Reiz/ Ptprc a Pepc b Foxp3 eGFP Foxp3 tm2Tch , Ccr7 –/– Ccr7 tm1.1Dnc Meox2 Cre Meox2 tm1(Cre)Sor Foxp3 eGFP Foxp3 eGFP Csf2 fx-ARE 33 Csf2 Csf2 ΔARE Meox2 Cre Csf2 fx-ARE 33 Csf2rb fx Csf2rb tm1c(EUCOMM)Hmgu 62 Cd11c Cre/wt Csf2rb fx/fx Csf2rb ΔDC Cd11c Cre Csf2rb fx o 2 Allergic sensitization and a mouse model of asthma For allergic sensitization, mice were lightly anesthetized with isoflurane and given one o.p aspiration of 100 μg LPS-free OVA (Worthington Biomedical) together with 10 μL HDE in a total volume of 50 μL in PBS (OVA/HDE) 20 63 5 5 323-339 Isolation of cDCs from the lung and mLNs Lungs were harvested from untreated mice or at 6 h, 16 h, or 18 h post-sensitization with OVA/HDE. Lungs were perfused by PBS injection into the right ventricle. For cDC preparation, lung tissue or mLNs were minced and digested with Liberase TM (100 µg/mL) (Roche), Collagenase XI (250 µg/mL), Hyaluronidase (1 mg/mL), and DNase I (200 µg/mL) (Sigma Aldrich) for 60 min. or 30 min. at 37 °C, respectively 63 + + lo lo lo – Adoptive transfer of alveolar macrophages Alveolar macrophages were cultured with recombinant GM-CSF as described previously with some modifications 64 + + + + + Csf2rb ΔDC Flow cytometric analysis and sorting Cells were diluted to 1-2×10 6 b 1κ 1 Coculture of cDCs and CD4 + To isolate CD4 + + b 1 + 4 3 2 5 Bone marrow-derived cDC culture Bone marrow cells were prepared from femurs, tibiae, humeri and sternums of C57BL/6 or Csf2rb ΔDC 6 63 + + + + – – – In vivo cDC maturation assay CD200 – – + – + – 5 + Lung cDC migration assay Mice were given PKH26 (10 μM) (Sigma) with or without OVA/HDE by o.p. aspiration (50 μL/mouse). Some mice received 1 μg PTX by o.p. aspiration 24 h prior to the PKH26 aspiration. MLNs were harvested 24 h after treatment, and digested for 30 min. Single cells were stained with Abs after RBC lysis. PKH26 + Analysis of Treg generation in the lung Naïve CD4 + 6 + + Imaging of precision-cut lung slices (PCLS) PCLSs were generated, stained, and visualized as previously described 65 1 Cellular indexing of transcriptomes and epitopes sequencing (CITE-Seq) CD11b + https://www.biolegend.com/en-us/totalseq 66 1 5 9 Analysis of CITE-seq data CITE-Seq raw data processing: Alignment, barcode assignment and unique molecular identifier (UMI) counting was performed using Cell Ranger 3.1.0 and the cellranger count command. Alignment was performed with the mouse mm10-1.2.0 reference. The following feature libraries were included for antibody sequencing: CD200 (TCAATTCCGGTAGTC), CD301b (CTTGCCTTGCGATTT), CD11b (TGAAGGCTCATTTGT), and Ly6C (AAGTCGTGAGGCATG). Outputs from filtered count matrices were used for subsequent analyses. Rounded estimates from Cell Ranger were 3,500/5,000/6,500 cells, 195,000/120,000/90,000 mean reads per cells, and 3,000/3,100/3,500 median genes per cell for the 0 h, 6 h, and 18 h samples, respectively. 96% of RNA reads mapped to the reference genome, and 97% of all barcodes were valid. scRNA-Seq dimensionality reduction and clustering: Data from scRNA-Seq were processed using the Seurat v3.0 package in R version 3.6.1 ( http://satijalab.org/seurat/ 67 68 67 30 69 https://scvelo.readthedocs.io/en/stable/ GSE261034 Csf2 35 Statistics Data are presented as mean ± SEM. Statistics to analyze differences among groups using Prism software are indicated in figure legends. Outliers identified by GraphPad Prism ROUT method (Q = 1%) were removed from analysis.
